Package it.polimi.ingsw.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Game.Game
public class Game extends Object
This Class contains all the elements in an instance of the game

      the game wanted, of type Game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(String name, PrintWriter printWriter) throws NameAlreadyRegisteredException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      This method adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      name - : the nickname of the player
      printWriter - it's for adding the communication channel "out" of the added player
      Throws:
      NameAlreadyRegisteredException - if the name has been already added
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(String name) throws NameAlreadyRegisteredException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      This method adds a player to the game (without passing the PrintWriter socket)
      Parameters:
      name - : the nickname of the player
      Throws:
      NameAlreadyRegisteredException - if the name has been already added
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This method terminates the game

    • endGameImmediately

      public void endGameImmediately()
      This method terminates the game immediately (without waiting finishing current turn) It's used in single player mode in witch there are some case in witch the game could terminate immediately

      This method remove a player that chose to quit the game
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game was already ended
